about.description_1: I am a highly motivated and passionate Full Stack web developer with a background in mining engineering. I have experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, along with knowledge of frameworks like React.js. Additionally, I am proficient in agile methodologies, GIT version control, and Back-End development using Node.js and relational databases. With an intermediate level of English, I am seeking an opportunity to apply my skills and knowledge in a professional environment.
about.description_2: Using a combination of cutting-edge technologies and trusted open source software, I create high-performance websites and apps
